name: Reactorland
startIntroPart1: Welcome to Wasteland Reaction Studios, wasteland's largest television and online streaming broadcasting network. WRS make countless content and shows since the year 2350, we make many of the top shows such as our world famous reaction video show called The People's Voices. Created by over 150,000 staff members who made the show possible, 10,000 on-screen talents all around Reactorland and over 5 billion viewers every year broadcasted via satellite and the tallest tower in the world, Reactor Tower located in the largest and capital city of Reactorland, Victoria. The People's Voices has been localized to over 189 countries all around the wasteland, our show's premise is to hear what our people's reaction and their opinions on what is happening and what is viral, not just locally but internationally. Be ready to laugh and get emotional to things around the world only in the world's most watched TV show, The People's Voices!
startIntroPart2: Watch The People's Voices, 16:00 - 21:00 only here in TV1 Reactorland... (Sponsored by WRS and the President's Office of Reactorland)
declaringWar: BREAKING NEWS: A foreign country has declared war against the people of Reactorland, I wish our country will survive and we must be prepared for it.
attacked: BREAKING NEWS: War has broke out in our homeland. Go inside the underground or a safe place to protect yourselves from civilian casualty.
defeated: This is Wasteland Reaction Studios, now signing off!
introduction: Welcome to Reactorland, we are the descendants of the Fine Brothers Entertainment reactors. Please watch us on the world's most watched TV show on the wasteland, The People's Voices only on TV1 Reactorland.
hateHello: The people of Reactorland will not tolerate any of your questionable actions.
